basics.name: Derrick Luyen
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I have recently graduated with a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa in Fall 2020. I am studying for a M.S. in the same field at the same school; I expect to graduate in Fall 2022.

highlights: Answer questions about ITS services and supported software from walk-in customers and assist students / faculty with tech-related problems

Assist in maintaining the ITS lab computers

awards.summary: Given to students who have a high school GPA of at least a 3.0, meet certain academic criteria, eligible for the Federal Pell Grant, and a bonafide Hawaii resident. $2000/yr
